❗ @emmberk reminder to add this back in

I extracted the force option and the logic to check if the SolrClient is available to this class. I also made this extend SubjectCommands so that the runWithSubjectOrElevate logic didn't need to be included in these classes.
Note that this can throw InterruptedException, which just bubbles up.
✏️ Nitpick: could use equalsIgnoreCase here instead.
